scripts.precompile-handlebar-templates: handlebars www/templates/*.handlebars -f www/js/precompiled_templates.js && handlebars www/templates/partials/*.handlebars -p -f www/js/precompiled_partials.js && cat www/js/precompiled_templates.js  www/js/precompiled_partials.js > www/js/precompiled_assets.js && rm www/js/precompiled_templates.js  www/js/precompiled_partials.js
